Class CustomOAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient

java.lang.Object
uk.aiapplied.scotaccountclient.CustomOAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.endpoint.OAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient<org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.endpoint.OAuth2AuthorizationCodeGrantRequest>
public class CustomOAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient extends Object implements org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.endpoint.OAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient<org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.endpoint.OAuth2AuthorizationCodeGrantRequest>
Custom implementation of OAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient for handling token exchange with ScotAccount. This class manages the OAuth2 authorization code grant flow with additional features:
  • JWT client assertion generation and inclusion
  • PKCE code verifier handling
  • Token response processing and validation
  • Detailed request/response logging
Token exchange process:
  1. Generate client assertion JWT using private key
  2. Build token request with authorization code and PKCE verifier
  3. Send request to ScotAccount token endpoint
  4. Process and validate token response
  5. Extract and decode token claims
  6. Build OAuth2AccessTokenResponse with tokens and claims
Security features:
  • Private key based client authentication
  • PKCE code verifier validation
  • Token claim validation
  • Secure logging of sensitive data

  • Method Details

    • decodeJwtPayload

      private Map<String,Object> decodeJwtPayload(String jwt)
      Decodes and parses a JWT payload into a Map of claims.
      Parameters:
      jwt - The JWT string to decode
      Returns:
      Map of claims from the JWT payload
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the JWT format is invalid
      RuntimeException - if there's an error parsing the payload

    • getTokenResponse

      public org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.endpoint.OAuth2AccessTokenResponse getTokenResponse(org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.endpoint.OAuth2AuthorizationCodeGrantRequest authorizationCodeGrantRequest)
      Performs the OAuth2 token exchange using the authorization code grant. This method handles the complete token exchange process with ScotAccount:
      1. Extracts authorization code and PKCE verifier from the request
      2. Generates a client assertion JWT for authentication
      3. Builds and sends the token request to ScotAccount
      4. Processes the token response, including:
        • Decoding and validating the ID token
        • Decoding and validating the access token
        • Extracting token claims and metadata
      Specified by:
      getTokenResponse in interface org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.endpoint.OAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient<org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.endpoint.OAuth2AuthorizationCodeGrantRequest>
      Parameters:
      authorizationCodeGrantRequest - The OAuth2 authorization code grant request
      Returns:
      OAuth2AccessTokenResponse containing the processed tokens and claims
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if required parameters are missing
      RuntimeException - if token exchange or validation fails
